00038 
00039 int uvm_ml_tlm_rec::startup() {
00040     try { 
00041         ::sc_core::uvm_ml_api::quasi_static_startup();  
00042     } UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_1(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION,0,0,0);
00043     uvm_ml_utils::m_quasi_static_elaboration_started = true;
00044     return 1;
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 #define UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_2(n, s1, s2) \
00049 catch( const sc_report& x ) \
00050 { \
00051   std::cout << x.what() << std::endl; \
00052 } \
00053 catch( const ::std::exception& x ) \
00054 { \
00055   std::cout << x.what() << std::endl; \
00056 } \
00057 catch( const char* s ) \
00058 { \
00059   ::std::cout << "\n" << s << ::std::endl; \
00060 } \
00061 catch( ... ) \
00062 { \
00063   ::std::cout << "\n" << "UNKNOWN EXCEPTION OCCURED" << ::std::endl; \
00064 }

00068 void uvm_ml_tlm_rec::sim_bootstrap() {
00069   try {
00070       ::sc_core::uvm_ml_api::quasi_static_sim_bootstrap();
00071   }
00072   UVM_ML_CATCH_SC_KERNEL_EXCEPTION_2(UVM_ML_QUASI_STATIC_ELABORATION, 0, 0)
00073 }

00077 namespace uvm_ml {
00078     bool in_elaboration() { 
00079         void *handle = dlopen(0, RTLD_NOW);
00080         if (handle == NULL) { 
00081             return false; //?
00082         }
00083 
00084         void *function_ptr = dlsym(handle,"udmInit");
00085         dlclose(handle);
00086         
00087         return (function_ptr == NULL); // ncelab doesn't contain udmInit
00088     }
00089 
00090 
00091     void uvm_ml_bootstrap(void* /* scSessionArgumentsT* */ /*sessionArguments*/) {
00092         if (in_elaboration()) return;
00093 
00094         framework_id = uvm_ml_utils::initialize_adapter();
00095         
00096     }

00115 void uvm_ml_tlm_transrec_base::object(sc_object* b) {
00116   sc_module* m;
00117   m_obj = b;
00118   uvm_ml_utils::add_transrec_to_map(m_obj, this);
00119   if (is_transmitter()) {
00120     m = b->get_top_parent_module();
00121     if (m) uvm_ml_utils::register_static_top(m->name());
00122   }
00123 }
00124 
00125 void uvm_ml_tlm_receiver_base::bind_export(sc_export_base* b) { 
00126   sc_module* top;
00127   object(b);
00128   m_iface = b->get_interface();
00129   top = b->get_top_parent_module();
00130   uvm_ml_utils::register_static_top(top->name());
00131 }
